Lakewood.AECOM Building:
AECOM ( ay-ee-KOM) (formerly known as AECOM Technology Corporation) is an American multinational engineering firm that provides design, consulting, construction, and management services to a wide range of clients.
AECOM has approximately 87,500 employees, and is number 156 on the 2016 Fortune 500 list. Fortune named AECOM as one of 2015 World's Most Admired Companies, and again in 2016 & 2017.
